name: 5th International Conference on Edge Computing
content: Pencis takes the privilege to invite speakers, participants, students, delegates and exhibitors from across the globe to its 5th International Conference on Edge Computing, to be held during December 19 & 20, 2019 in the beautiful city of Singapore. The 5th International Conference on Edge Computing is a prime international forum for both researchers and industry practitioners to exchange the latest fundamental advances in the state of the art and practice of Edge computing, identify emerging research topics, and define the future of Edge computing. The conference covers topics related the localized resource sharing and connections with the cloud. EDGE Computing 2019 invites original Abstracts addressing all aspects related to edge computing technology.
